snippet: Meera Joshi was nominated by Mayor Bill de Blasio despite her role in expanding street hail service and the Taxi of Tomorrow, policies he attacked during the mayoral campaign.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio says he will nominate Meera Joshi, who served as general counsel of the Taxi and Limousine Commission, as its chairwoman, moving to fill a lingering vacancy at the agency, which he chided frequently during the mayoral campaign.
lead_paragraph: Meera Joshi was nominated by Mayor Bill de Blasio despite her role in expanding street hail service and the Taxi of Tomorrow, policies he attacked during the mayoral campaign.

headline.main: De Blasio, Critic of Taxi Commission, Picks Its Ex-Counsel to Lead It
headline.print_headline: De Blasio, Critic of Taxi Commission, Picks Its Ex-Counsel to Lead It
